content.raw: Addendum: It's tricky to get the arm position right. Would be nice if user could start on a flat surface (the table), but we'd need to provide the table height...He's never entirely happy with the arm positioning, always feels a bit off. When moving arm along flat table, the sim arm goes up and down a bit.
content.html: Addendum: It's tricky to get the arm position right. Would be nice if user could start on a flat surface (the table), but we'd need to provide the table height...He's never entirely happy with the arm positioning, always feels a bit off. When moving arm along flat table, the sim arm goes up and down a bit.
